thread.section_title: Muscle Meals Direct Reviews | Customer Service Reviews of Muscle Meals Direct | musclemealsdirect.com.au
thread.title: Stephen Tran
thread.title_full: Muscle Meals Direct reviewed by Stephen Tran

author: Stephen Tran
title: Stephen Tran
text:
Always had a bad gut and decided that after joining my new job, i also needed to change my health.
Two weeks in and eating twice a week on a 450 gram diet along with gym and protein. im starting to feel healthier about my choice and my stomach is every so slowly going away.
My mind is playing games with me as i want to eat food at home because my dad makes the most aromatic smelling food i would ever eat. But its worth tanking it out for your health goals.
Food itself is not bad either. I had a bad time with the steak as it gave me tremendous runs, so i decided to stop eating that. But the grilled chicken takes the trophy to be my best next to the tuna salad.
Another 2 months and 2 weeks to go with my diet, and im hoping to god i change my life around if even just a little.
P.S. i want better sauces : <
